TEXT.TITLE: <SUN HUNG KAI CO LTD> YEAR 1986
TEXT.BODY: Shr 21.6 H.K. Cents vs 12 Final div six cents vs three, making nine cents vs 5.5 Net 121 mln dlrs vs 67.42 mln Note - Extraordinary gains 72 mln dlrs vs 2.7 mln. Special bonus four cents vs nil. Dividend payable May 25, books close April 28 to May 6. REUTER
